name: Jigoku Dansu
description:
Warning: This game was created in a gamejam and designed to be played specially played with gamepad.

One Samurai, 4 phases, many creatures trying to prevent him from leaving hell. Can you handle this with only one Dash was a weapon?

CONTROLS:

Move - WASD/Left Stick
Dash - Space/A(On Xbox gamepad)

You would be helping us by filling this 1 minute form: https://forms.gle/LfUkem49UxLXdnd77
